definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: Among 54 local breed species, 37 species distribute in Oriental.
sentences.chinese: 在54种当地繁殖鸟类中，东洋界37种。

sentences.english: This fits with their extremely slow growth and reproduction rates.
sentences.chinese: 这一点与他们极低的成长速度和繁殖率相吻合。

sentences.english: Probiotics contain live micro-organisms, so-called good bacteria that colonize the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌含有活力微生物，可以在肠道内存活繁殖。

sentences.english: The Naoli River Watershed is an important breeding area for rare and endangered Oriental White Stork.
sentences.chinese: 挠力河流域是濒危水禽东方白鹳主要繁殖区域。

sentences.english: Grayish quiet-dispositioned highly productive european honeybee .
sentences.chinese: 略带灰色且性情安静的欧洲蜜蜂，繁殖率高。

sentences.english: The fish has also shown up late in the puffin's breeding season.
sentences.chinese: 在海雀繁殖季节，这种鱼出现比较晚。

sentences.english: The postembryonic development and fecundity of P. piraticus were investigated at 6 constant temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 报道了温度对真水狼蛛发育和繁殖的影响。

sentences.english: Albatrosses nesting in the Southern Ocean often undertake circumpolar trips between breeding seasons.
sentences.chinese: 信天翁在南大洋筑巢往往繁殖季节之间进行极地考察。

sentences.english: In this paper, the effect of Osteopontin (OPN) gene on the Black Dahe pig reproductive performance was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了骨调素基因对大河乌猪繁殖性能的影响。

sentences.english: This practice would have reduced the likelihood of inbreeding, she added.
sentences.chinese: 她还补充说，这样做可以降低近亲繁殖几率。

sentences.english: He says he will try to breed more cattle and rebuild his life.
sentences.chinese: 他说他会尽力繁殖更多的牛和重建他的生活。

sentences.english: Rosy pipits seem to have broad and long supercilium in non-breeding plumage.
sentences.chinese: 粉红胸鹨似乎在非繁殖羽时有粗而长的眉线。

sentences.english: This fungus victimizes a particular type of cicada found in East Asia, using it as a host in which to propagate.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲，这种菌通过一种特殊的禅作为宿主繁殖。

sentences.english: Then by tissue culture, virus-free strawberry plants were propagated in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 批量繁殖草莓无毒苗得到成功。

sentences.english: The effect of high-voltage pulse current on the vitality and reproduction of pine wood nematode was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究高压脉冲电流对松材线虫活力和繁殖的影响。

definition: to multiply/to reproduce/to increase gradually in number or quantity
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
parthenogenesis (biol. a female reproducing without fertilization)
to pass the winter/to overwinter/to live through the winter
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
